traits.name: Brutal Critical
traits.desc: The fire phantom can roll one additional weapon damage when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the fire phantom dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren’t being worn or carried.

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.desc: A creature that touches the fire phantom or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the fire phantom can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls that turn but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fire phantom makes two fist of fire attacks.

actions.name: Fist of Fire
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.
